Detailed Description

Real time default clock for TREX.

This class implements a real-time clock based on gettimeofday primitive to be used for TREX agent.

Author:
Conor McGann & Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Constructor.

Parameters:
secondsPerTick tick duration in seconds

Create a new instance with the tick duration set to secondsPerTick

Precondition:
secondsPerTick should be greater than 0.0

Definition at line 75 of file RealTimeClock.cc.

RealTimeClock::RealTimeClock ( boost::property_tree::ptree::value_type &  node  )  [explicit]

XML parsing constructor.

Parameters:
node A XML clock definition

Create a new instance based on the constent of node. The expected structure of node is 

 <RealTime tick="<duration>"/>

where <duration> is a float giving the number of seconds per tick.

Exceptions:
TREX::utils::Exception tick attribute missing
TREX::utils::bad_string_cast unable to parse tick attribute
TREX::utils::Exception tick attribute value is less than 0

TICK RealTimeClock::getNextTick (  )  [virtual]

Compute tick date.

This method get the system time and identify what is the current tick

Returns:
current time in tick
Note:
If more than one tick duration happened between the last call and this one. This method will display it in the TREX log.

Implements TREX::agent::Clock.
